tweet.text: Following a distinguished career in the U.S. Army, Colin Powell served as 65th U.S. Secretary of State from 2001 to 2005. Today, we will highlight key moments related to Gen. Powell’s military and civilian service. https://t.co/SbLYlA0zu1 https://t.co/5jyaaKB0I8
